channel.title: Security-misc breaks network connectivity
channel.description: Hi all, I installed these packages on my Debian 12 VirtualBox VM: `lkrg* ufw hardened-runtime hardened-malloc-kicksecure-enable hardened-malloc apparmor-utils apparmor-profiles-kicksecure* sandbox-app-luncher` and everything works fine. After I checked everything is working after reboot, I rebooted it again and installed `security-misc` and both of my network interfaces goes down. Please help me!

item.title: Security-misc breaks network connectivity
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
Hi all,
I installed these packages on my Debian 12 VirtualBox VM: lkrg* ufw hardened-runtime hardened-malloc-kicksecure-enable hardened-malloc apparmor-utils apparmor-profiles-kicksecure* sandbox-app-luncher and everything works fine.
After I checked everything is working after reboot, I rebooted it again and installed security-misc and both of my network interfaces goes down. Please help me!

Read full topic
